snippet: A fiscal shopping list by a happy band of Republicans and Democrats fails to ask, “How will we pay for this?”
abstract: Michael Powell Gotham column holds that fiscal shopping list by a happy band of Republicans and Democrats in New York State Senate fails to ask how to pay for it all; contends lawmakers have, with self-satisfaction, pushed through a proposed budget resolution that is all about strategy and not real money.
lead_paragraph: A fiscal shopping list by a happy band of Republicans and Democrats fails to ask, “How will we pay for this?”

headline.main: In the New York Senate, Playing a Game of Legislative Fantasy
headline.print_headline: In the New York Senate, Playing a Game of Legislative Fantasy
